opts.opt: Stock Stuctures associated with management of stock (yards, shelters)
Gardening and agriculture Areas or structures associated with growing plants for food or ornamental reasons (nursery, household garden, orchard)
Residential dwelling Building used primarily as a residence for people
Residential outbuildings Ancilliary structures used mostly by people and associated with a residential dwelling, but that are not used as a residence (e.g. outhouses, external kitchen)
Industrial Industrial facilities associated with manufacturing or production, regardless of scale or commercial intent (mining, milling timber, brick making, lime kiln)
Commercial Features directly associated with commercial activities (e.g. store, hotel, bank)
Communications Features directly associated with communication (telegraph station or line, radio tower)
Transport Features constructed to aid transportation of people or goods (e.g. weir, bridge, landing, loading ramp, railway siding)
Water management Features associated with storage or movement of water (e.g. tanks, weirs)
Religious Features associated with religious worshop and associated actiivites (e.g. church)
Memorials Features marking significant events or activities, but not associated with a burial (e.g. historic monument)
